ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker

Class AbstractSpeaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker.AbstractSpeaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.SoundPool.OnLoadCompleteListener, Speaker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SampleSpeaker, VocalizerSpeaker

    public abstract class AbstractSpeaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Speaker, android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.SoundPool.OnLoadCompleteListener
    Class provides an ability to playing audio with audio focus handling. Child should implement onStart() and onCancel() to start and stop playing action.
